title: Clipper Wars
description: It's the XIV century! [Clippers](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clipper) are revolutionizing sea transport and rich gentlemen are drowning themselves in tea! A *situation* has caused an shortage of tea in New York City and it's up to **you** to deal with it!
goalStr: Add `(stock new-york tea)` to the fact table.
successStr: Did that ship have opium on it? It sailed by so fast I didn't see.
